title: England lockdown end date confusion: Did government 'mess up?'
description: Business owners say contradictory government guidance means they did not know when they could reopen.

title: Lockdown rules: Michael Gove's Covid claims fact-checked
description: We look at the Cabinet Office minister's assertions about the coronavirus lockdown measures.

title: Fans to return to football at EFL midweek games after coronavirus restrictions
description: After being barred from most matches since March, some supporters in England will return to stadiums on Wednesday.

title: Ofsted points to total school disruption in some areas
description: Regional Ofsted bosses say schooling has been 'completely disrupted' by Covid-19 in some areas.

title: Debenhams set to close putting 12,000 jobs at risk
description: The move comes after the failure of last-ditch efforts to rescue the ailing department store chain.

title: Brexit: How does the new UK points-based immigration system work?
description: The new immigration system has gone live for people wanting to work in the UK from 1 January.

title: Giulio Regeni: Egypt 'suspends' investigation into Cambridge student's murder
description: Italian prosecutors believe Egyptian security agents killed PhD student Giulio Regeni in 2016.

title: Philadelphia Eagles' Carson Wentz pulls off last-gasp 'Hail Mary' pass to Richard Rodgers
description: With time running out, Carson Wentz pulls off a last-gasp 'Hail Mary' touchdown pass to Richard Rodgers during their 23-17 loss to the Seattle Seahawks.

title: Christmas comes early as people rush to buy trees
description: It's a bumper year for British tree growers as customers look for some early festive cheer.

title: Covid-19: No plans for 'vaccine passport' - Michael Gove
description: It follows suggestions pubs and restaurants may turn away people who don't get a coronavirus vaccine.

title: Hamilton to miss Sakhir Grand Prix after catching Covid-19
description: World champion Lewis Hamilton will miss this weekend's Sakhir Grand Prix after testing positive for coronavirus.

title: UK house price growth 'fastest for almost six years'
description: Property price rises accelerated last month, the Nationwide says. but growth is set to slow next year.

title: Lastminute.com to pay £7m in holiday refunds
description: More than 9,000 customers have yet to be repaid for cancelled package holidays amid the Covid crisis.

title: Coronavirus: MPs to vote on tougher tiers for England
description: Some Conservative backbenchers are threatening to vote against the plans, but Labour will abstain.

title: Grünten statue: Mystery over missing phallic landmark
description: The statue had become a landmark for hikers in Bavaria, but no-one really knew how it came to be there.

title: China refuses to apologise to Australia for fake soldier image
description: The retort came after Canberra demanded an apology over a fake image of a soldier killing a child.

title: I hope to return soon, says Wolves' Jimenez in first statement since fracturing skull
description: Wolves striker Raul Jimenez says he hopes to "return to the pitch soon" in his first statement since fracturing his skull on Sunday.

title: Watch eight great goals from the FA Cup second round - and vote for your favourite
description: Which goal of the FA Cup second round was your favourite?

title: Fight Talk: Joe Joyce, Oleksandr Usyk, Mike Tyson, Oscar de la Hoya
description: Could Joe Joyce beat Oleksandr Usyk? Plus Mike Tyson wants to fight every two months and Oscar de la Hoya says Gennady Golovkin would be "easy work" - it's Fight Talk.

title: The Papers: Tory revolt over tiers and Scotch eggs with beers
description: Tory MPs preparing to rebel over Covid rules and the PM's attempts to stop them lead several papers.

title: Covid-19: Lung damage 'identified' in study
description: Researchers are to investigate whether young people and those not in hospital could be affected.

title: Covid vaccine: Rumours thrive amid trickle of pandemic facts
description: Social media is full of coronavirus vaccine information - but how can you tell which is reliable?

title: Mohsen Fakhrizadeh assassination: How will Iran respond?
description: The scenarios for how Iran could retaliate over the dramatic assassination of Mohsen Fakhrizadeh.

title: A police officer with a conscience who left Belarus
description: Andrei Ostapovich quit his job as a Belarusian police officer, was detained in Russia, then escaped to Poland.

title: Audrey Hepburn unheard interview in new documentary
description: An unheard interview with screen legend Audrey Hepburn forms the basis of a new documentary.

title: Covid-19: ‘Our business model has been made illegal’
description: What happens to your business when Covid takes your customers away?

title: Breastfeeding mums ‘lacked support’ during lockdown
description: Devenia Noel struggled to get help when her daughter Zora was born with a tongue-tie.

title: Burnley: ‘Children ripping bags open for food’ during pandemic
description: The "unprecedented need" for help during the pandemic seen by a church in Burnley.

title: Masked Indian comic superhero fights Covid-19 fear
description: India's first female comic superhero Priya, a gang-rape survivor, battles disinformation around Covid-19.

title: Missing Florida sailor found clinging to capsized vessel
description: The man, 62, was rescued by a passing container ship, more than 80 miles off the Florida coast.
